entry.title: Syntax Highlighting
entry.content:
This is only a test ``` ruby Discover if a number is prime http://www.noulakaz.net/weblog/2007/03/18/a-regular-expression-to-check-for-prime-numbers/ Source Article class Fixnum def prime?

('1' * self) !~ /^1?$|^(11+?)\1+$/

end end Now here is a java code java Sample code http://deepumohan.com/tech/ public class MyClass {

   public static void main(String[] args) {
          System.out.println("Hello World!!");
   }

}
